text:
DANGER
Keep Hands Clear
When Equipment
Is Running

//: signage for the civilian security areas (non-public).
text: Keep guns holstered or locked up

NOTICE
Check in with your squad on the hour.

//: signage for research scientist levels (working lab areas).
text: Do not look into laser with remaining eye

There have been
[4]
days without a life-threatening workplace accident

<color_white_red>THINK!</color>
<color_white_red>DON'T CONTAMINATE!</color>
<color_white>Don't store food in sample refrigerators!</color>

Think!
Do it the safe way.
Do it the right way.
Do it everyday.

3 causes of accidents are
I didn't think
I didn't see
I didn't know
Not to be operated by fuckwits

Stokey the Chemist says:
'Only YOU can prevent lab fires.  Because you're the asshole who started the last three.'

//: signage for research scientist levels (working lab areas).
text: PE150 is no longer to be administered to the following specimens <lt>scratched out text<gt>

There have been
[21]
days without a breach incident
PE050 is to be administered twice a day to the remaining subjects
Report ALL incidents of coworkers speaking to the subjects
Computer lessons will continue for Mr Jingles, Abelard, and Ratty

//: propaganda signage for the volunteer mutant level.
text:
<color_white>Bob palmed his midday dose.
Bob's in the infirmary now
Don't be Bob: Take doses as advised.</color>
<color_red>Your best self is yearning to break free!</color>

<color_yellow_red>Find your spirit animal guide!</color>
      Group meditation
      Wednesdays 13:00

//: snippets of pithy safety messages that can be delvivered via sign or drone.
text:

[4]
days without a life-threatening workplace accident

Think!
Do it the safe way.
Do it the right way.
Do it everyday.
